products.title: Nail Polish Bottle Holder
products.description:
Features:


	
	It is a wearable nail polish bottle holder for doing your nails anywhere.
	
	
	Made of 100% soft, flexible and comfortable silicone 
	
	
	It securely and comfortably fits all fingers and holds all nail polish brands
	
	
	Small enough to fit in a makeup bag
	
	5.2cm x 5.2cm x 5.2cm


Random colour will be provided.

products.title: Electronics Accessories Organizer
products.description:
Keep all your cables and small peripherals filed and tidy with the Electronics Accessories Organizer. This travel organizer offers a secure storage space for cord management and electronic accessories putting everything you need in one place. Small and lightweight, it fits your briefcase or backpack without taking much space and you will save time on the go by easily finding what you need.

Features and benefits:


	Multifunctional bag. A simple and effective organizer that provides excellent flexibility to carry your cables, flash disk, USB drive, adapter, phone, charger, batteries, SD card, and headsets around. Can also be used as a cosmetic bag or grooming kit bag.



	Exquisite design. Equipped with 2 premium zippers that make it easier to open/close the bag. The high elasticity loops keep your items intact and in place.



	Excellent protection. Constructed of heavy-duty, durable, and water-repellent nylon molded case that keeps your item safe, secure, and protected from scratches, dust, and accidental dropping.



	Large capacity. The interior compartment has enough space for storing various items. It has 6 elasticized mesh segments, 12 elastic loops for cables, 1 SD/TF card storage segment, and 1 big mesh pocket for smartphone.


Product Specification: 


	Material: Nylon
	Size: 24x 17 x 2.5cm/ 9.44 x 6.7 x 0.98 inches


Package Included: 1x Organizer bag (electronic accessories are not included)

products.title: Angry Mama Microwave Steam Cleaner
products.description:
Tired of cleaning up your microwave after a messy food warm up? We've all been there, we all know how hard it is. It's time to leave it to Angry Mama to handle things. Just mix some water and vinegar, let her in for some time and magic just takes place. Say goodbye to hours of scrubbing and cleaning!

Features:


	Material: Rubber
	Weight: 98g


Easy steps:


	Step 1: Remove the top of Mama's hair by twisting counter-clockwise. Pour vinegar and water till each of the respective markings. Replace the top and twist to lock in place.
	Step 2: Microwave for 5 - 8 minutes on a high setting. After about 2 minutes steam will start to blast out.
	Step 3: Remove the Mama by the elbows.
	Step 4: Just wipe down the microwave with a sponge, napkin or rag, and voila a spotless clean microwave
